name: Tag game (WillCatoProductions)
description: You're the red and the computer is the green. When the green tags you tag the green so when the green is chasing you use the A,S,D, and W to run around so don't let the green tag you get as many points as you can if you score a lot of points you win if the green score a lot of points you lose so maybe you might save your high score if you score a lot of points when you get a lot points
